title: JusticeHub Platform Vision

the_problem.headline: A Fragmented System Failing Our Young People
the_problem.description: Justice-involved youth in Australia face a fragmented support system. Services exist in silos - legal support here, mental health there, employment programs elsewhere. Young people and their families must navigate this maze alone, often falling through the gaps. The result: high recidivism, broken futures, and communities bearing the weight of systemic failure.
key_statistics: Over 5,000 young Australians are in youth detention on any given day
Indigenous youth are 17x more likely to be in detention than non-Indigenous peers
Up to 80% of young people in detention have a cognitive disability or mental health condition
Most 'services' operate in isolation with no coordinated pathway

the_vision.headline: One Platform, Whole-Person Support
the_vision.description: JusticeHub is building the connective tissue between services, stories, and support. A unified platform where justice-involved youth can discover programs, access resources, and find their pathway forward - all in one place. Where community organizations can coordinate, share insights, and amplify impact. Where lived experience drives design, and data sovereignty is respected.
core_principles: Community-centered: Built with and for the communities we serve
Holistic: Addressing the whole person, not just the 'offense'
Strength-based: Focusing on potential, not pathology
Culturally safe: Indigenous data sovereignty and cultural protocols at the core

for_young_people: Program Finder: Discover mentorship, education, employment, and cultural programs
My Pathway: Track progress and connect with support coordinators
Community Voices: Read stories from others who've walked similar paths (via Empathy Ledger)
for_organizations: Service Directory: Showcase programs and connect with referral networks
Impact Dashboard: Track outcomes using holistic wellbeing indicators
Collaborative Tools: Share insights while respecting privacy and data sovereignty
for_community: Story Platform: Share experiences with full consent control
Community Map: Visualize the network of support services
Excellence Hub: Celebrate achievements and innovations
